version_statement.version_notes: Integrated NIDS data with comprehensive mental health assessments and harmonized psychological instruments (Stata format)

title_statement.title: NIDS-CRAM Complete Waves 1-5 (2020-2021) with Mental Health Harmonization

study_info.abstract: Complete NIDS-CRAM dataset with five waves of mental health data integrated with economic and household variables. Includes harmonized psychological instruments (depression, anxiety, stress scales) suitable for cross-study comparisons and harmonization research. Data collected during COVID-19 pandemic with rich contextual variables. Format: Stata 14.
study_info.geog_coverage: Nationally representative NIDS sample with mental health module across all provinces
study_info.analysis_unit: Individual household members with mental health assessments
study_info.data_kind: Longitudinal panel survey with clinical mental health measures in Stata format
study_info.universe: NIDS household members aged 18+ with comprehensive mental health data
